::Lord Elder/Scorponok/Zarak::

Elder aids Jotunn and fires three shots at Scorponok.

Scorponok uses his pincers to block the oncoming attacks. Zarak makes a decision.

Zarak: Bah! Scorponok has taken some serious damage and this is becoming more trouble then it was worth. You'll feel the power of the Generation 2 Decepticon Empire soon!

Zarak climbs into the cockpit section of Scorponok and burrows underground, attempting to escape.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                                  OOC: I think Kham was having some problem posting, from what he told
 me. There could be a delay with him because of that.
 
 BIC:
 
 Jotunn was about to reply something but the  missiles took his
 attention away from the speech. That blasted decepticon was ruining it
 all!
 
 He deviated on of the missle with his axe, but another one caught him
 full frontal and sent him flying a few meters away. When he got up, he
 growled and had his gatling gun at the ready. He fired straight at
 Scorponok.
 
 Jotunn: You decepticon bastard! I remember your name, Zarak! You are
 no Cybertronian, yet you seek to play us like puppets to your
 ambitions? Not on my shift! He continued firing his gatling gun,
 hoping Elder would do something as well.
